page.title: 16SHOPPING IN RADSTOCK.
page.content: We have many shops in Radstock,these include a number of privately owned shops,like M.Moons and A.Button.We have a Co_op which is,at the moment, being remodernised and enlarged,it also has a new title which is "Radco." We also have a shoe shop and a number of take away food shops.We have a D.I.Y. shop called Casswells and a sports shop called Veaters. In Radstock we have a number of food shops including butchers,bakers and grocers. Amongst all the non food shops,we have a number of estate agents,two banks and a large post office.To complete the shops in the centre of Radstock there is a video shop, chemist,off licence and two cafes. Other amenities include a library, health centres and surgeries.On Saturdays there is a market.
